src:
Dolar AS Tekuk Balik Rupiah ke Rp 14.035
07 Nov 2019, 02:53 by Ardan Adhi Chandra


Foto: Grandyos Zafna

Jakarta - Nilai tukar dolar Amerika Serikat (AS) terhadap rupiah pagi ini berada di level Rp 14.035. Demikian dikutip dari data perdagangan Reuters, Kamis (7/11/2019).Rupiah cenderung melemah dibandingkan posisi kemarin terhadap mata uang Paman Sam. Rupiah kemarin berhasil menekuk dolar AS ke level Rp 13.978, namun kondisinya kini berbalik.Dolar AS dalam dua pekan terakhir tercatat bergerak stabil di bawah level Rp 14.100. Kemarin, akhirnya dolar AS lengser dari level Rp 14.000.Sementara itu, pada pembukaan perdagangan Kamis (7/11/2019), IHSG menguat 12 poin (0,21%) ke level 6.231. Indeks LQ45 juga naik 2,6 poin (0,27%) poin ke 990.Sementara itu, bursa Amerika Serikat (AS) ditutup Bercampur. Dow Jones ditutup 27.492,56 (-0,00%), NASDAQ ditutup 8.410,63 (-0,29%), S&P 500 ditutup 3.076,77 (+0,07%). Bursa saham AS ditutup melemah tanpa banyak pergerakan. Simak Video "Walau Dolar AS Melonjak, Nokia Tetap Percaya Diri"[Gambas:Video 20detik](ara/ara)
text:
US Dollars Bend Rupiah Back to Rp. 14,035
Nov 7 2019, 02:53 by Ardan Adhi Chandra


Photo: Grandyos Zafna

Jakarta - The exchange rate of the United States dollar (US) against the rupiah this morning is at the level of Rp 14,035. As quoted from Reuters trade data, Thursday (11/07/2019). The rupiah tends to weaken compared to yesterday's position against Uncle Sam's currency. Yesterday the rupiah managed to bend the US dollar to the level of Rp. 13,978, but the condition is now reversing. Yesterday, the US dollar finally stepped down from the level of Rp 14,000. Meanwhile, at the opening of trading on Thursday (11/07/2019), JCI strengthened 12 points (0.21%) to 6,231. The LQ45 index also rose 2.6 points (0.27%) points to 990. Meanwhile, the United States (US) exchanges closed mixed. Dow Jones closed 27,492.56 (-0.00%), NASDAQ closed 8,410.63 (-0.29%), S&P 500 closed 3,076.77 (+ 0.07%). US stock markets closed lower without much movement. Check out the video "Even though the US Dollar is soaring, Nokia Still Confident" [Gambas: Video 20 seconds] (fig / fig)
